keyMoments.title: All Straw Hats Gather Against Oars
keyMoments.description: The entire present crew (minus unconscious Nami and pursuing Luffy) assembles to face Oars together.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's unity when facing overwhelming threats.

keyMoments.title: Crew Accepts Oars' Challenge
keyMoments.description: The assembled Straw Hat crew prepares to battle Oars as he challenges them.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the major crew battle against the giant zombie.

name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.title: Moria Orders Oars to Hunt Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Gecko Moria commands his ultimate zombie weapon Oars to hunt down and destroy all Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Deploys the crew's ultimate weapon against their enemies.

keyMoments.title: Hogback Defeated
keyMoments.description: Hogback is trampled by Oars, effectively removing him from the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Loss of one of the crew's key members through friendly fire.
